<class name="AbstractUnivariateSolver" extends="BaseAbstractUnivariateSolver" startLine="22">
* Base class for solvers. 3.0 $Id: AbstractUnivariateSolver.java 1379560 2012-08-31 19:40:30Z erans $
* Construct a solver with given absolute accuracy. absoluteAccuracy Maximum absolute error.
* Construct a solver with given accuracies. relativeAccuracy Maximum relative error. absoluteAccuracy Maximum absolute error.
* Construct a solver with given accuracies. relativeAccuracy Maximum relative error. absoluteAccuracy Maximum absolute error. functionValueAccuracy Maximum function value error.
